title: How much would you pay for a weapon of your favorite champion?
body:
Now that iv had a few votes I want to point out it cost between 500- 1000 to make a weapon so I'd need some profit on top of that for the time put into them.
Im use you have seen the project yi sword and I make the parts to create things like that.

I am hoping to make some form of living out of something i want to do. (if people are willing to pay enough) Needless to say they would be full size and in proportion to the average human (so something likes fizz trident wouldn't be tiny.

https://img0.etsystatic.com/106/0/12880509/il_570xN.960120330_4t52.jpg
You can expect it to be this type of quality.
Here are just some designs of project leonas and scorched earth renekton. These are just the shape that the sheet metal would need to be before a lot of hand work would go into them.
https://i.imgsafe.org/f5b7be4.png
https://i.imgsafe.org/0288db0.png
Even if your weapon wasn't from league it could be from another game like warframe.
https://i.imgsafe.org/22b3027.png

I could also make your weapon designed as a real weapon or as a decoration wall mount.
For this project yi sword from globator (who im friends with) it would cost £3000 on his esty page. https://www.etsy.com/uk/listing/290371277/full-metal-league-of-legends-weapon?ref=market

If you really do want something made add me on Skype :gunattackuk

Look for the demon circle

replies.body: However much a Klondike bar cost.

what would you do for Klondike bar?
*5 mins later*
OH GOD HE IS KILLING EVERYONE RUN!
But i don't want a broken lamp..{{champion:24}}

other skins are available xD
tho a cardboard tube is not recommended

Can you make a hockey stick though :?

Just realized how many of the weapons are hilarious
*goes to local hockey store and just paints the colours on* done where do i send it?
that'll be $3000

> [{quoted}](name=DarkenedAuras,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FA8KicHL,comment-id=00010000000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-14T00:02:18.112+0000)
>
> that'll be $3000

dont be silly thats way to cheap we are looking more at £5000 for that.
OP promised us a weapon quality cardboard tube.

> [{quoted}](name=Captain Unusual,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FA8KicHL,comment-id=000100000001,timestamp=2016-05-14T01:51:10.324+0000)
>
> OP promised us a weapon quality cardboard tube.

I'll get a steel rod, rough it up with some sand paper cave the line down it when the papers overlap and then paint it brown then I'd come hit you with it xD
You could save some cash by using a cardboard tube.
{{champion:20}} Would I get a Yeti?
{{champion:432}} Gimme dat bwampbwamp stick.

> [{quoted}](name=Bard to Master,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FA8KicHL,comment-id=000f,timestamp=2016-05-14T00:48:27.195+0000)
>
> {{champion:432}} Gimme dat bwampbwamp stick.

I could make that but it wouldn't make the sounds and it wouldn't have the in game glow effects so it look rather dull anything else your thinking about?
you could make the end translucent and have a low glow bulb in it
As a Cho'gath main, I fear I am left out of this conversation...

> [{quoted}](name=PartyPanda12,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FA8KicHL,comment-id=000d,timestamp=2016-05-14T00:38:10.010+0000)
>
> As a Cho'gath main, I fear I am left out of this conversation...

*Thinking ... thinking.... thinking....* *brain blows up* yes I have literly no idea what I could make for you outside a whole battelcast chogath suit (which I could make if you got the money) my skills with metal will never be a limiting factor ;D however I might be the first person to wear out a protractor getting all those angels of metal to weld together lol

I am tempted to devote my life to earning the money to buy a full Battlecast Prime Cho'gath suit from you, and then spend the rest of my days contentedly clomping around in cities in it roaring at people and telling them, "evolution is past, extermination is present" until I am arrested.

However, on closer examination, I think I will let this opportunity slide. Oh well, I kinda find myself regretting missing this golden opportunity.
I'll pay you $1000 for {{champion:64}}'s feet. They have to be real human feet though.

> [{quoted}](name=xxxDogmanxxx,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FA8KicHL,comment-id=0017,timestamp=2016-05-14T02:18:06.716+0000)
>
> I'll pay you $1000 for {{champion:64}}'s feet. They have to be real human feet though.

http://www.humanleather.co.uk/humanleatherproducts.html 18000 euros for a set of slippers
{{champion:90}} A knife that I do absolutely nothing with? Sign me in :D

id buy Jhin's guns and Azir's Staff though would need to save up quiet a bit.
As for how much guess would depend on the quality and time it would take to make it but would pay 500+( proabably more)  for crafted weapons

WARFRAME?!

Hell, if I had the money I'd pay a good 2k for a Scindo Prime.

I'm broke, though. Hello darkness, my old friend...

if i can't cut somebody with it im not interested 

and wtf at the person who said jhin's gun. part of his gun requires connecting to his body.

> [{quoted}](name=Asinine,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FA8KicHL,comment-id=0046,timestamp=2016-05-14T12:36:34.910+0000)

> if i can't cut somebody with it im not interested

Wait, do you sell magic powers?

>
> Wait, do you sell magic powers?

sorry magical powers cost extra.

{{champion:32}} Is it possible to weaponize tears?
{{champion:12}} My fists?
{{champion:57}} Where would I even find exploding saplings?
{{champion:8}} Throwing my blood at people wooo

http://www.x-entertainment.com/articles/0748/3.jpg
die them purple

{{champion:202}} 

FOUR hundred forty-four dollars and forty four cents.

$3000 ice cubes? 
{{champion:34}}

Very cool. but you should know that many if not all types of events that people would like to bring these to for cosplay purposes wouldn't allow full metal (functional) weapons. 

And if it was just going to be for display you may find the market for fully functional display items is... limited.

True, costs could certainly be lowered for "display" peices by cutting a few corners or using other materials. That said, there would definately be a market for full-on works, but that market is signicantly smaller.
Can you make me {{champion:103}} weapon?
the spirit life essence of men after mating is quite expensive.
{{champion:54}} what am I gonna do with a bunch of rocks I can't even lift

{{champion:75}}
My main being Teemo, the only hard part is finding a hollow stick made for a blowdart. Don't think that would be worth more than 50 euros, even with shipping and finding said stick.

http://vignette2.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/2/22/Omega_Squad_Teemo_League_Of_Legends_Login_Screen_With_Music/revision/latest/scale-to-width-down/640?cb=20150401150846
i do have abit of know how with projectiles and was planing to make a weapon that fired shotgun shells from the middle.
http://vignette4.wikia.nocookie.net/warframe/images/d/d6/TnoGunblade.png/revision/latest?cb=20141127183103
and also i could always make the shrooms lol

So I main Gangplank....
How much for a ship loaded with cannons and powder kegs?

Nothing! Becuase Karma doesn't use weapons :D
But if she did I'd pay whatever the amout to get it
But I already have ballz :/{{champion:134}}
Are they giant and purple and detachable?
I would love a Karthus or Azir staff, just something to display or mess around with

> [{quoted}](name=XC4evr,realm=NA,application-id=cIfEodbz,discussion-id=FA8KicHL,comment-id=0027,timestamp=2016-05-14T04:20:32.547+0000)

would love mecha sion hammer but im poor and am currently saving for a new headset so...lol
but your stuff looks great

Has anyone in this thread actually bought anything from you yet?

#brokef2pgame14yroldshavenomoney
I. NEED. BLADE. OF. THE. EXILE.
well if you want it (and are actually willing to pay) then add me on skype : gunattackuk. Look for the devil summon circle (unless skype messed up icons again)
